Fitting¶

class dmipy_jax.fitting.neural.NeuralEstimator(key: <function PRNGKey at 0x7f1f14cf8900>, input_size: int, output_size: int, width: int = 128, depth: int = 4)[source]¶

Bases: Module

layers: list¶
dmipy_jax.fitting.neural.fit_neural(data: Array, model: NeuralEstimator, key: PRNGKey, n_mc_samples: int = 50)[source]¶

Fits the data using the Neural Estimator with MC Dropout Uncertainty.

Parameters:

  • data – (N_voxels, N_signals) array of signal data.

  • model – Trained NeuralEstimator.

  • key – JAX PRNGKey.

  • n_mc_samples – Number of forward passes for uncertainty.

Returns:

(N_voxels, N_params) std: (N_voxels, N_params)

Return type:

mean

dmipy_jax.fitting.neural.generate_training_data(model_func: Callable, prior_ranges: Array, n_samples: int, key: PRNGKey)[source]¶

Generates synthetic signal (X) and parameters (Y) on the fly.

Parameters:

  • model_func – Function Y -> X.

  • prior_ranges – Array of shape (n_params, 2) defining (min, max) for each param.

  • n_samples – Number of samples to generate.

  • key – JAX PRNGKey.

Returns:

(n_samples, n_signals) Y: (n_samples, n_params)

Return type:

X

dmipy_jax.fitting.neural.train_estimator(model_func: Callable, prior_ranges: Array, n_samples: int = 1000000, batch_size: int = 1024, learning_rate: float = 0.001, n_epochs: int = 10, key: PRNGKey = Array([0, 0], dtype=uint32))[source]¶

Trains a Neural Estimator.

Parameters:

  • model_func – Biophysical model function params -> signal.

  • prior_ranges – (n_params, 2) array.

Returns:

The trained NeuralEstimator.

Return type:

trained_model

class dmipy_jax.fitting.optimization.OptimistixFitter(model_func, parameter_ranges, solver_settings=None, scales=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

A JAX-optimized fitter using Optimistix’s Levenberg-Marquardt solver. This provides 2nd-order convergence and robust handling of non-linear squares.

fit(data, acquisition, init_params)[source]¶

Fits a single voxel using Levenberg-Marquardt.

class dmipy_jax.fitting.optimization.VoxelFitter(model_func, parameter_ranges, solver_settings=None, scales=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

A JAX-optimized fitter using the Pure-JAX L-BFGS-B solver. This allows full compilation and vectorization on the GPU.

fit(data, acquisition, init_params)[source]¶

Fits a single voxel. Can be vmapped over ‘data’ and ‘init_params’.

Parameters:

  • data – (N_measurements,) array of signal data.

  • acquisition – JaxAcquisition object.

  • init_params – (N_params,) array of initial guess (REAL scale).

dmipy_jax.fitting.optimization.mse_loss(params, data, bvals, bvecs, model_func, unwrap_fn)[source]¶
